oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The complete works of Henry George
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: George, Henry, 1839-1897
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: I. Progress and poverty.--II. Social problems.--III. The land question. Property in land. The condition of labor.--IV. Protection or free trade.--V. A perplexed philosopher [Herbert Spencer]--VI. The science of political economy, books I and II.--VII. The science of political economy, books III to V. "Moses": a lecture.--VIII. Our land and land policy.--IX-X. The life of Henry George, by his son Henry George, jr.
On cover: Complete works of Henry George. Fels fund. Library edition.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Economics
